  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void createMap​(java.lang.String path)
    Creation of the game's map, the class takes the image from "path" and divides it in a 32x32 square, then it will control the square's color: black = wall, white = point, red = enemy, blue = player.

      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • createMap

      public void createMap​(java.lang.String path)
      Creation of the game's map, the class takes the image from "path" and divides it in a 32x32 square, then it will control the square's color: black = wall, white = point, red = enemy, blue = player.
      Parameters:
      path - gets the image
